document.docAuthor: Çiftçi, Derya, Růžička, Jan, Hasbenli, Abdullah & Şahin, Ülfet
document.masterDocTitle: The large carrion beetles (Coleoptera: Silphidae) of Turkey: a review with a new species record

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The large carrion beetles (Coleoptera: Silphidae) of Turkey: a review with a new species record

11.VI.2008
, A. Hasbenli leg. (MAZMGU).

Remarks. Widely distributed Palaearctic species, known from Europe to Western Siberia and the west of China (Růžička 2015). In central Europe, the species prefers forests and is most abundant in dry coniferous forests (e.g., Růžička 1994 ). In Turkey , its distribution is scattered and records are known from only a few provinces ( Fig. 27 ). Here we provide the first record from Konya Province .
